overview:
Pamela Egan is a board-certified nurse practitioner specializing in OBGYN Care, Women’s Anti-Aging Care, Preventive Medicine, Skin Care and Diabetes Care. N.P. Egan is also a clinical nutritionist, certified diabetes educator and globally-acclaimed health columnist whose columns helped revolutionize the world’s understanding of the critical degree of importance of sufficient vitamin D levels relative to overall health.

Mrs. Egan has over 35 years of clinical experience, and is widely regarded as among the nation’s leading experts in preventive care, the effects of nutrition on disease prevention and overall health, bioidentical hormone replacement therapy, vitamin D3 and anti-aging technologies.

Her writings have appeared in the Newsbanner, the St. Tammany News - Slidell News Sentry, numerous clinical journals, Woman’s World Magazine and many, many more.
